name: BuiltInParameterTransformer_transformTest
description: Unit tests for the BuiltInParameterTransformer's transform method.

nested_classes.name: ParameterizedTypeImpl
nested_classes.description: Internal class implementing ParameterizedType for testing purposes

test_cases.name: testTransformStringToBigDecimal
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to a BigDecimal.

test_cases.name: testTransformStringToOptionalBigDecimal
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to an Optional<BigDecimal>.

test_cases.name: testTransformStringToUnsupportedType
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to an unsupported type, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testTransformNullValue
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a null value to a BigDecimal, expecting a null result.

test_cases.name: testTransformStringToEnum
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to an enum.
